reporting-org.narrative: Bundesministerium für wirtschaftliche Zusammenarbeit und Entwicklung (BMZ)
Federal Ministry for Economic Cooperation and Development (BMZ)

description.narrative: EFA-GMR ist ein redaktionell unabhängiger Jahresbericht, der die Grundlage bei dem jährlichen Treffen der EFA High Level Group bildet, bei dem Fortschritte ggü. von der Weltgemeinschaft beim Weltbildungsforum in Dakar gemachten Zusagen überprüft werden.

The GMR is an independent annual report building the basis for the annual Higl level meeting of the EFA High Level Group to monitor progress towards the six Education for All (EFA) goals to which more than 160 countries agreed as part of the Dakar Framework for Action, adopted during the World Education Forum in 2002.

The GMR is an independent annual report building the basis for the annual Higl level meeting of the EFA High Level Group to monitor progress towards the six Education for All (EFA) goals to which more than 160 countries agreed as part of the Dakar Framework for Action, adopted during the World Education Forum in 2002.
